alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:16PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Randolph and Pocahontas Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1012 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms from Buckeye northeast to Elkins, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elkins, Marlinton, Cass Scenic Railroad, Greenbank, Snowshoe, Dailey, Mingo, Beverly, Durbin, Hillsboro, Harman, Pheasant Run, Arbovale, Cheat Bridge, Dryfork, Glady, Minnehaha Springs, Boyer, Bowden and Buckeye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph
